MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY13 postcode area of Whitchurch, affecting properties in Doddington, Newport Road and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:15PM 31st January 2021
